channel.title: CVE Feed for Lenovo Group Ltd. -- E95, ThinkCentre M710s/M710t
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Lenovo Group Ltd. -- E95, ThinkCentre M710s/M710t

item.title: CVE-2017-3771|2024-08-05T14:39:40.932Z -- lenovo%20group%20ltd. -- e95%2C%20thinkcentre%20m710s%2Fm710t
item.description: System boot process is not adequately secured In Lenovo E95 and ThinkCentre M710s/M710t because systems were shipped from factory without completing BIOS/UEFI initialization process.
